price: José disse: "Confia-me os cofres da terra. Por certo, serei deles custódio sapiente."
arabic: قَالَ ٱجۡعَلۡنِي عَلَىٰ خَزَآئِنِ ٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ إِنِّي حَفِيظٌ عَلِيمٞ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: qāla ij'ʿalnī ʿalā khazāini al-arḍi innī ḥafīẓun ʿalīmun
